hof.net.userMessages

Class ButtonInfoMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • hof.net.userMessages.AbstractMessage
      • hof.net.userMessages.ButtonInfoMessage

  • public class ButtonInfoMessage
extends AbstractMessage
    This message is used to express if an button is pressed or not. It also shows which button is pressed.
    For this the three constants NORMAL, LEFT and RIGHT are used.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LEFT
      Expresses that the left button is pressed.
      static int NORMAL
      Expresses that no button is pressed.
      static int RIGHT
      Expresses that the right button is pressed.
